event: The Great Chase - FatHopes Energy Team Building 2025
description: As a team, we have to overcome challenges and mysteries while racing against other teams from Shah Alam to Port Dickson.
As a team, we built an amphibian robot that can runs on both land and water, while avoiding obstacles.

event: Pertandingan Kuiz ICT, Universiti Tun Hussein Onn Malaysia
description: Despite we are still in our highshool, we won the quiz challenge held by Universiti Tun Hussein Onn Malaysia as a team.

event: iHack 2013 Competition: Hacking for Security, UiTM
description: Jeopardy style CTF hackathon. Using our wit to solve cryptography, reverse engineering, web exploitation, forensics, and binary exploitation challenges.

event: Dew Challenge: The Xtreme Ride, by Mountain Dew
description: Up onto the Batu Cave, down onto the river in Putrajaya, physical challenges around Klang Valley in a single day.
